name: amputation
headline: Bankrupted Adventurer Flees
article: An unfortunate encounter with a giant spider leaves an adventurer in need of amputation. However, after the operation, they found the cost to be too high, and they forgot to renew their guild insurance. The adventurer has vanished after taking out a loan for the cost of an arm and a leg.

name: boot
headline: Angry Adventurers Get the Boot
article: After a punch-up in an overcrowded local tavern, the owner, wielding his magical boots of kickening, launched the offenders through the tavern roof and out of this town for good. Unfortunately, the tavern was destroyed from the force.

name: magic-gate
headline: "We're Bored and Leaving"
article: A group of adventurers have become tired of this town and its lack of housing, to the point where they can't event stand being in the same dimension! They've opened up a magic gate, and stepped through to the unknown.

outcomes.customDescription: 3 adventurers move on to the unknown

name: neck-snapping
headline: Taken Too Far
article: Adventurer, known as the town Jester, unfortunately lost his life last night after he was performing one of his famous bits. The performer pretends to twist his head around, but had unfortunately twisted his head too far. The audience stated that his last words were "Hey guys, Watch this"

name: propaganda
headline: Propaganda Campaign Causes Exile
article: A nearby targeted harassment campaign from a nearby competing town causes adventurers to start leaving us. The enemies are making untrue claims, such as "we aren't providing housing for our township", and "we'll be destroyed any day now". You would never hear such falsehoods from THIS paper! We would never lie...

name: quicksave
headline: Insane Adventurer "Forgets to Quicksave"
article: A homeless adventurer just went on a horrible murder spree after 'getting bored'. His defense is that "I meant to reload after, but forgot to quicksave, I'm so sorry". He ran away before facing judgement.

name: stone-cold-killers
headline: Stone Cold Killers!
article: A warrant has been issued for rogue adventurers accused of murder after being seen running from the scene of petrified villagers, holding what looked like a head with hair of snakes.

name: thief
headline: Beloved Adventurer Hastily Leaves
article: Before riding off, they were sporting a striking new look, adorned in several gold chains and a blood red shirt. When asked where they found their new look, they joked "I'll never tell" before riding quickly into the forest. In other news, a number of people were found dead in their homes, the murderer seemed to have only taken the deceased's jewellery before leaving.

name: touch-of-gold
headline: Touch of Gold
article: A disgruntled adventurer looking to make quick buck has blessed your people with gold... Made of those same people! One of our heroic adventurers jumped on the madman, turning themselves into gold, and crushing them in the process. Try as we might, we couldn't unfreeze the lost. We mourn as we melt and sell off all this new gold we found.

outcomes.customDescription: On the upside, we got some gold!
